forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 31. West wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 45. West wind 8 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn approaches in Boston, the night air remains cool and crisp, a gentle reminder of the autumn season slipping toward winter's embrace. Currently, the stars twinkle faintly, undisturbed by clouds, while a westerly breeze dances playfully, rustling the last of fallen leaves scattered on the sidewalk. The night's chill may have settled in, but the morning promises a welcome transformation; the sun will rise unimpeded, gracing the city with a brilliance that warms both heart and spirit.

Expect a sunny day ahead, with the temperature gradually climbing to a comfortable level by midday. Such clarity invites exploration and connection with the outdoors; a leisurely walk along the Charles River or a visit to one of the city’s many neighborhood cafés would be most delightful. To embrace the cool temperatures, dress warmly—perhaps in an easy scarf and a well-loved coat—while remaining mindful of the blue sky overhead that beckons for light layers. Delight in the simple pleasures of a weekday, whether it be enjoying a good book in a sunlit park or sipping coffee while watching the world of Boston unfold.
